title: sarasiruha nayanaa
sahitya:
sarasIruha nayana nI kaTAkSamE cAlu sajjana jIvana

anupallavi

 mIna mArbhakula kAminci dAna mI lankanu jUcinaTla

caraNam 1

 sAdhu sangati nEnu salipina aTla mAdhurya bhOjna maTu jEsinaTla
   
caraNam 2

 dhana kanakamu lella dagilina aTla dinamu durAsalu dIrina aTla
   
caraNam 3

 simhAsanamuna jelagina aTla brahmEndra paTTanubhava mandinaTla
   
caraNam 4

 nAlugokka padi bhuvana mElinaTla kalugu kulamulella kaDatErinaTla
   
caraNam 5

 rAjIva bhavanuta ramaNiya carita rAjillu shrI tyAgarAjAdi vinuta
